location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paper.Dimensions: 250 x 348mm, on sheet 328 x 404mm.

mods.abstract: Plan depicting Mukalla [Al Mukalla, Yemen] and the surrounding area. The plan indicates hydrology, settlements, roads, and pipelines, as well as providing some indication of relief in the form of hachures.Prepared by naval staff in the Admiralty's Naval Intelligence Division.
